name: Canadian Canine Mesa Harness
description: The ultimate harness for furry explorers. The Mesa Harness is comfortable, breathable and padded, providing four points of adjustability for the best possible fit. A handle allows you to assist your dog when walking through talus fields or any other situation. Reflective piping lets you keep an eye on them in low-light conditions.Buckle closures for easy on and off.Comfortable and breathable padding.Multiple adjustment points for a custom, secure fit.Attachment point for a light.Reflective details.Lead points on chest and back.
